City Council
------------

The Taft City Council holds
[regular meetings](https://www.tafttx.gov/events/)
on the first and third Tuesdays of each month at 6:30 P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue. Public participation is encouraged.

The Taft Economic Development Corporation (Taft EDC) holds
[regular meetings](https://www.tafttx.gov/events/)
on the second Tuesday of each month at 5:30 P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue.

on the third Tuesday of each month at 6:30P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue.
